Reviews.Title: Garbage thin wire gives blurry video image
Reviews.Author: D. J.
Reviews.Content: These are the most cheap and lowest quality Siamese I see. These wires are total waste of money. Your signal will suffer with poor quality wire. I find the copper wire is so thin when I cut it to connect.  The video image is blurry with this 100ft cable after I connected it to my CCTV camera.  I was so disappointed. I wouldn't recommend others order anything from this company.The cable can't work well. It gave us a very blurry picture. It have problem with distortion and drop of in power. You get what you pay!Buyer Beware!!!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one video and power cable
Plug and Play ready
4 Pack of 100 feet video/power cables in white
ProductInfo.Name: 4 Pack of 100ft 100 Feet All-In-One Siamese Video and Power BNC Cable for CCTV Security Camera Surveillance System
